title: Stays in background
comment: And I suppose it collects data for the opencellid project. Not bad, but I want battery life. Have to check if this is a problem. With cyanogenmod you can force close it.

title: Good. But how to close it?
comment: I have to go to force it to close from the app manager as it doesn't seem to close on the back button. And i can't find a menu option for that?

title: Fantastically useful app
comment: Keypad Mapper makes it so easy to take notes while out walking.  After importing into JOSM, I can map an area much more quickly than I used to be able to.

title: pretty good dedicated mapping app
comment: Doesn't try to do too much, but solves one problem quite well.  Very fast for recording GPS location for small house numbers. Slower for house numbers that are longer.  It's not perfect - the menu access that work in every other Android app (like the hard "menu" button) don't bring up the menu in this app. It could do with a few more niceties like direct upload to Open StreetMap.  Overall, pretty gopd.

title: Simple but useful Gpx recorder.
comment: When you're out and about and want a simple way to record data for Openstreetmap then this is your app. This is almost perfect but there's no way to update or edit the information once recorded. That's the only reason for not giving it 5 stars.
With the undo icon the last recorded house number can be deleted from file.

title: Works well
comment: Could use a tiny bit of ux work to explain 'start recording' better.

title: Much better than OSMTracker
comment: I was doing the same exact thing with osmtracker,  but it just doesn't work as well for addresses.

title: This must be cool
comment: I bet one day I'll figure out how to use it

It IS cool contributing to OpenStreetMap - the free Wikipedia like opensource project for a world map.
The Keypad-Mapper 3 can be used to contribute house numbers and addresses to OpenStreetMap.
Go out to your city and try it - it is really fun!

title: Perfect
comment: As an Openstreetmap perhaps for over 6 years, finally I can map addresses easily.

title: Does exactly what I need
comment: Quick and easy way to collect house numbers.
Great app! It makes it simple to contribute.

title: New House Number Mapper
comment: Great app that has resulted in me starting to map house numbers.  It might be useful to have auto increment for numbers.  In the UK we generally have odd numbers on one side and even on the other.  To map both sides as you walk down a street I suspect you would need an entry box for left and right with independent auto increment of 2 for each as it doesn't follow that 2 is opposite to 1 etc.    Another option might be to have a button that just adds 2 to the last entry.  This would be useful in some situations and would save on key presses as soon as you get into double digits.  Many thanks for the app.

title: Great app!
comment: Works fine for gathering house numbers and new features are really cool.

title: OSM essential
comment: Excellent app for gathering address details. I've used its earlier versions but this is far better & improving all the time. Thanks for maintaining it. Tallguy

title: Great concept
comment: Works well as advertised. Some more obvious way (stop button) to stop data collection would be useful. Also intelligent prediction of next housenumber the user would just press okay to enter would be amazing

Latest Keypad-Mapper version provides STOP button. Pls update.
Prediction of next house number: pls provide your idea how to predict the next house number.
Thx alot for contributing to OSM!
